thread.title: Germania colloca 402 mln riapertura Bund indicizzato 2026 Bond

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 402 mln riapertura Bund indicizzato 2026 Bond
text: March 06 (Reuters) - The German Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 0.402 billion euros in a top up of its 0.10 percent, 2026 inflation-linked bond (linker) at the lowest price of 108.14, the Bundesbank said on Tuesday. The linker (ISIN:DE0001030567) are due to mature on April 15, 2026. The settlement date is March 06. Results of Feb 06 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 06/03/18 06/02/18 AVG. YIELD -0.87 pct -0.9 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 108.15 108.54 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 108.14 108.52 TAIL 0.01 0.02 TOTAL BIDS 0.993 bln euros 1.299 bln euros ALLOTTED 0.402 bln euros 0.801 bln euros RETAINED 98.5 mln euros 199.5 mln euros BID COVER RATIO 2.5 1.6 TOTAL VOLUME 13.5 bln euros 13.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at ESZB/BBK05. ((Berlin newsroom; Tel: +49 30 2888 5142;
